DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 study will asses the LDL-C lowering efficacy of ETC-1002 versus placebo in subjects with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: A Single Center Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of ETC 1002 in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of type 2 diabetes meeting all of the following: Minimum 6 month history of diabetes prior to screening visit; Fasting Cpeptide ≥ 0.8 ng/mL at screening visit; HbA1C at screening visit 710%; Fasting glucose from 140270 mg/dL on Day 7 following washout of all glucose regulating drugs and supplements. BMI at screening visit from 2535 kg/m2; LDLC at screening ≥ 100 mg/dL
